item.title: IPO市场在72亿美元融资潮后步履蹒跚地进入季节性低迷期
item.description: 备受期待的IPO热潮可能需要更长时间才能显现，因为新股发行市场步入季节性清淡期。【原文：The highly-anticipated IPO boom may take a little longer to materialize as the market for new issuances limped into a seasonal quiet period.】

item.title: 谷歌抢先发布499美元Pixel 10a，iPhone 17e发布在即
item.description: 谷歌母公司Alphabet旗下品牌近日推出新款入门级Pixel智能手机，希望通过新增的人工智能软件功能、硬件细节优化以及维持499美元的定价策略，弥补此次迭代更新中缺乏突破性改进的不足。【原文：Alphabet Inc.’s Google introduced its latest entry-level Pixel smartphone, hoping that new AI software capabilities, minor hardware refinements and an unchanged $499 price can make up for an otherwise iterative update.】

item.title: 量子初创企业Pasqal以独角兽估值寻求2亿欧元融资
item.description: 据知情人士透露，法国量子初创企业Pasqal SAS正筹备一轮融资，拟筹集2亿欧元（约合2.37亿美元），此轮融资将使该公司估值突破10亿美元。【原文：French quantum startup Pasqal SAS is in talks to raise €200 million ($237 million) in a round that would value it at more than $1 billion pre-money, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 标普500指数在经历人工智能板块谨慎情绪后攀升，交易员寻求赢家
item.description: 周三美国股市小幅走高，投资者纷纷追捧遭抛售的个股。此前因担忧人工智能可能对多个行业造成冲击，市场经历了一段震荡行情。【原文：US equities edged higher on Wednesday as investors hunted for beaten-down stocks following a stretch of choppy trading driven by concern about the potential disruption that artificial intelligence poses to a bevy of sectors.】

item.title: 哈萨克斯坦无法摆脱中国石油管道依赖，1月数据显示
item.description: 哈萨克斯坦1月份仅能将少量无法通过中哈管道运输的原油转运至黑海，导致该国原油产量大幅下滑。【原文：Kazakhstan was able to divert only a small fraction of the crude it could not ship through the CPC pipeline to the Black Sea in January, contributing to a sharp drop in production.】

item.title: 美国天然气价格下跌，交易商关注冬季供暖季结束
item.description: 美国天然气期货价格下跌，因交易员评估持续至本月末的升温前景，这降低了寒流来袭的可能性，而寒流本可提振这种取暖燃料的需求。【原文：US natural gas futures declined as traders weigh warming outlooks stretching through the end of the month, decreasing the chance for a shot of cold weather to materialize and push up demand for the heating fuel.】

item.title: BNP关注与收购融资、伦巴第贷款相关的风险转移
item.description: 法国巴黎银行正就两项重大风险转移计划向投资者进行试探，这两项计划分别涉及高净值客户贷款及杠杆收购融资业务。【原文：BNP Paribas SA is sounding out investors for two significant risk transfers tied to loans for wealthy clients and leveraged buyout financing.】

item.title: 贸易商阿尔卡格斯塔将通过欧洲北约输油管道供应航空燃油
item.description: 大宗商品贸易商Alkagesta将通过欧洲最重要的能源管道网络之一开始供应航空燃油，这是其供应协议的一部分。【原文：Commodity trader Alkagesta will start delivering aviation fuel through one of Europe’s most important energy pipeline networks as part of a supply agreement.】

item.title: 美国工业生产增幅创近一年新高
item.description: 美国1月工业生产增幅创近一年新高，主要得益于制造业全面增长以及公用事业产出再次实现强劲增长。【原文：US industrial production rose in January by the most in nearly a year, fueled by a broad increase in manufacturing and another healthy advance in utility output.】

item.title: 荷兰合作银行称欧洲央行行长提前离任或降低欧元风险
item.description: 荷兰合作银行外汇策略主管简·弗利表示，据报道，克里斯蒂娜·拉加德决定提前卸任欧洲央行行长一职，此举或能保护欧元价值免受威胁欧洲央行独立性的因素影响。【原文：Christine Lagarde’s reported decision to step down early from the presidency of the European Central Bank could protect the euro’s value from threats to ECB independence, according to Jane Foley, head of FX strategy at Rabobank.】

item.title: 法国央行行长维勒鲁瓦称继任者需立足欧洲
item.description: 法国央行行长弗朗索瓦·维勒鲁瓦·德加洛表示，继任者必须保持独立并致力于欧洲事务。此前他提前辞职，意外为总统埃马纽埃尔·马克龙提供了挑选下一任央行行长的机会。【原文：Bank of France Governor Francois Villeroy de Galhau said his successor must be independent and committed to Europe after his early resignation gave President Emmanuel Macron a surprise opportunity to pick the next central bank chief.】

item.title: 意大利计划从电费账单中剔除碳成本，引发市场震荡
item.description: 意大利正筹备对电力市场进行全面改革，计划从电费账单中剔除碳成本——此举已在能源市场引发震动，并导致远期价格急剧下跌。【原文：Italy is preparing a sweeping overhaul of its electricity market that would strip carbon costs from power bills — a move that has sent shock waves through energy markets and driven a sharp selloff in forward prices.】

item.title: 哈塞特抨击纽约联储研究关税损害美国企业
item.description: 美国国家经济委员会主任凯文·哈塞特称，纽约联邦储备银行一项显示美国企业承担关税负担主要部分的研究“令人难堪”，相关人员应受到“纪律处分”。【原文：National Economic Council Director Kevin Hassett said a study from the Federal Reserve Bank of New York showing US companies bear most of the tariff burden “is an embarrassment” and the people associated with it should be “disciplined.”】

item.title: 美国保险公司2026年美元对冲交易量突破"解放日"热潮
item.description: 保险公司正争相购买美元远期合约，以对冲自年初以来美元汇率波动加剧的风险。【原文：Insurers have been rushing to buy forward contracts on the dollar as they seek to hedge against the greenback’s increased volatility since the start of the year.】

item.title: 美国称委内瑞拉今年石油产量可增长30%-40%
item.description: 美国能源部长克里斯·赖特表示，委内瑞拉今年可将石油产量提高30%至40%，日增产量约30万至40万桶。【原文：Venezuela can bolster oil production by 30% to 40% this year, an increase of roughly 300,000 to 400,000 barrels a day, according to US Energy Secretary Chris Wright.】

item.title: Nexfibre将以20亿英镑收购替代网络宽带公司Netomnia
item.description: 由西班牙电信公司（Telefonica SA）和自由环球公司（Liberty Global Corp.）共同持股的宽带企业Nexfibre Networks Ltd.已同意以20亿英镑（约合27亿美元）收购光纤挑战者品牌Netomnia Ltd.的所有者，此举标志着竞争激烈的英国市场迎来首次重大整合。【原文：Nexfibre Networks Ltd., the broadband venture owned by Telefonica SA and Liberty Global Corp., has agreed to buy the owner of fiber challenger brand Netomnia Ltd. in a deal valued at £2 billion ($2.7 billion), marking the first major consolidation in the crowded UK market.】

item.title: 卫星制造商SWISSto12据悉正考虑最早明年启动首次公开募股
item.description: 据知情人士透露，瑞士卫星系统制造商SWISSto12 SA正考虑最早于2027年进行首次公开募股。【原文：Swiss satellite systems maker SWISSto12 SA is considering an initial public offering as soon as 2027, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 美国新屋开工量大幅增长，升至五个月高点
item.description: 美国12月新屋开工量升至五个月高点，因建筑商为利用较低的借贷成本而扩大了生产规模。【原文：New residential construction in the US rose to a five-month high in December, as homebuilders boosted production to take advantage of lower borrowing costs.】

item.title: 美国12月核心资本货物订单超出预期
item.description: 美国12月商业设备订单增幅超出预期，表明随着贸易政策不确定性逐渐消退，去年年底资本投资表现强劲。【原文：US orders for business equipment increased in December by more than projected, suggesting solid capital investment at the end of last year as trade policy uncertainty gradually diminished.】

item.title: 印度寻求英国协助开发海上风电项目
item.description: 印度与英国组建了联合工作组，共同推进在南亚国家印度的海上风电项目开发。印度计划开发其沿海至少71吉瓦的潜在风能资源。【原文：India and the UK formed a task force to develop offshore wind projects in the South Asian country, which is looking to harness at least 71 gigawatts of potential energy off its coastlines.】

item.title: 德斯马雷斯家族选定前银行家奥沙利文接替奥尔出任电力公司首席执行官
item.description: 加拿大电力集团任命前投资银行家詹姆斯·奥沙利文担任首席执行官，杰弗里·奥尔在执掌公司六年后卸任首席执行官职务，转任副董事长。【原文：Power Corp. of Canada handed the chief executive officer’s role to former investment banker James O’Sullivan, with Jeffrey Orr stepping down to become vice-chair after six years at the helm.】

item.title: 自由环球同意收购荷兰沃达丰齐格公司合资企业
item.description: 自由环球有限公司同意以10亿欧元（约合12亿美元）现金及新控股公司股权，收购其合作伙伴沃达丰集团在荷兰电信公司沃达丰Ziggo的全部股权。【原文：Liberty Global Ltd. agreed to buy out its partner Vodafone Group Plc in Dutch telecommunications company VodafoneZiggo for €1 billion ($1.2 billion) in cash and a stake in a new holding company.】

item.title: 阿布扎比基金加码比特币押注 尽管加密货币遭遇重挫
item.description: 阿布扎比的穆巴达拉投资公司及其旗下子公司于第四季度增持了比特币交易所交易基金的持仓，在加密货币市场大幅下挫之际扩大了持仓规模。【原文：Abu Dhabi’s Mubadala Investment Co. and one of its units boosted their positions in a Bitcoin exchange-traded fund during the fourth quarter, adding to their holdings amid a significant downturn in the cryptocurrency market.】

item.title: Wingstop同店销售额与利润超预期，股价应声上涨
item.description: Wingstop公司股价在盘前交易中大幅上涨，此前该公司公布的国内同店销售额降幅低于预期，且盈利超出市场预期，缓解了市场对这家炸鸡连锁店业务明显放缓的担忧。【原文：Wingstop Inc. shares jumped in premarket trading after the company reported domestic same-store sales that contracted less than what was predicted, and better-than-expected earnings, easing fears of a marked slowdown at the chicken chain.】

item.title: 数十年积压的虐待赔偿金挤压加州学校和市政预算
item.description:
美国人口最多的州取消性侵诉讼时效限制后，针对公共机构的诉讼案件如洪水般涌现。

【原文：

The removal of a statute of limitations on sexual abuse lawsuits has unleashed a flood of cases against public agencies in the most-populous US state.

】

item.title: 关税仅导致中国贸易小幅转移，欧洲央行研究显示
item.description: 欧洲央行的一项研究表明，中国对世界其他地区出口增加的主要原因并非特朗普的贸易关税。【原文：Donald Trump’s trade levies aren’t the main reason why China is exporting more to other parts of the world, a European Central Bank study showed.】

item.title: 美国盘前活跃股：英伟达、帕洛阿尔托网络、闪迪、纽约时报
item.description: 截至纽约时间上午7:48，标普500指数期货上涨0.3%，逢低买盘涌入市场。【原文：S&P 500 Index futures rise 0.3% as of 7:48 a.m. in New York as dip buyers step into the market.】

item.title: 力拓增持加拿大矿企股份以提升锂产量
item.description: 知情人士透露，力拓集团已取得加拿大镁斯克锂业的多数股权，此举旨在加大对魁北克省锂电池金属相关项目的投资力度。【原文：Rio Tinto Group took majority control of Canada’s Nemaska Lithium as part of a push to invest more in Quebec projects tied to the battery metal, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 拉加德提前离任将缩小欧洲央行行长竞选范围
item.description: 克里斯蒂娜·拉加德的提前离任可能缩小了角逐欧洲央行行长职位的候选人范围。【原文：An early departure by Christine Lagarde could narrow the field of candidates vying to succeed her as European Central Bank president.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯的Humain向马斯克的xAI投资30亿美元
item.description: 沙特阿拉伯人工智能公司Humain向埃隆·马斯克的xAI公司投资30亿美元，深化了这位全球首富与沙特王国的联系，该国正致力于成为全球人工智能强国。【原文：Saudi Arabian artificial intelligence company Humain has invested $3 billion into Elon Musk’s xAI, deepening ties between the world’s richest man and the kingdom as it pushes to become a global AI powerhouse.】
